## Tile.uniqueKey property

Gets the key to uniquely represent this tile (based on the \[\[tileKey\]\] and \[\[offset\]\]), note this key is only unique within the given \[\[DataSource\]\], to get a key which is unique across \[\[DataSource\]\]s see \[\[DataSourceCache.getKeyForTile\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get uniqueKey(): number;
```
